description.desc1: this node makes is possible to patch into its containing subnode
description.desc2: Use its blue connector to connect to the properties-connector of the other nodes in the subpatcher. this allows to switch the connected nodes on/off with the subpatcher's switch.

Notes.note1: only one node of this kind is allowed per subpatch

Feedback.feedback1: Documentations take a lot of time and effort. Unfortunately both are scarce ressources.
Feedback.feedback2: If you would like to have more info about this node please drop a note. It helps to set priorities according to the user needs...
